

## Python Monorepo Generator Extension

This VS Code extension generates complete Python monorepo structures with backend, apps, packages, docs, and development configurations.

### Project Requirements
- VS Code Extension written in TypeScript
- Command to create Python monorepo structures
- Automatic generation of folders, configs, tasks, and debug settings
- User input for monorepo name

### Development Guidelines
- Use VS Code Extension API
- Implement command registration and file/folder generation
- Include proper error handling and user feedback
- Follow VS Code extension best practices
